column.name: SEQUENCE_NUMBER
column.comment: A sequence number. This column in combination with the ACCOUNT_ID col umn specifies the BillPeriod to which the BatchPattern is related. Will be Null if the DocumentPattern to which this BatchPattern is related is not relat ed to any DocumentTemplates

column.name: LOADTM
column.comment: - data warehouse entry change date timestamp (Original name in the DWHDB "_LOADTM")

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: Data warehouse entry last action type: "I"-Inserted, "U"-Updated, "D"-Deleted.

column.name: START_DATE_TIME
column.comment: The start date and time of the BillPeriod

column.name: END_DATE_TIME
column.comment: The end date and time of the BillPeriod

column.name: SUPPRESSED_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicates whether the Invoice to be produced for the BillPeriod has been suppressed (For use in future increments. Can be populated as true or false for increment 1)

column.name: STATE_CODE
column.comment: Indicates whether the BillPeriod is OPEN or CLOSEDValues: OPEN (Note space at end) CLOSE

column.name: CLASS_ID
column.comment: The ID of the class of which an instance will be created from a row in the table

column.name: CYCLE_NAME
column.comment: This is the name of the cycle associated to the mailing for the document pattern of the account related to the bill period at the time the bill period was created. -  This is the name of the Cycle associated with the Account.

column.name: APPROVAL_STATUS
column.comment: This field is used to check if the Invoicing for a specific Bill Period was approved or not.The values are PRE_RE ( PREVIOUS_REJECTED ) PRE_AC ( PREVIOUS_ACCEPTED9

column.name: PRICING_STATUS
column.comment: This field tells if the Bill Period was sucessfully priced.

column.name: SUB_SEQUENCE_NUMBER
column.comment: A Bill Period can be split into several sub periods. This column specifies the number of one period within a bill period

column.name: PARTITION_GROUP
column.comment: Partition group name. Used for purposes of partitioning the Billable E vent Database.

column.name: EVENT_DELETION_INDICATOR
column.comment: Y if events that this bill periods is based on are already deleted (usually 90 days).

column.name: ARCHIVE
column.comment: Y if data that this bill periods is based on is already archived (usually 6-24 months).
